# ICommit interface

Provides access to the details of a commit

```csharp
public interface ICommit
```

## Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| [Author](ICommit/Author.md) { get; } | The author of the commit |
| [Date](ICommit/Date.md) { get; } | Date and time of the commit |
| [ID](ICommit/ID.md) { get; } | The commit ID, presented in the form of a SHA-1 hash. |
| [Message](ICommit/Message.md) { get; } | The commit message added by the author |
